resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103967</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103967</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202661</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Essays of Definition: Lively Writing through Professional Models</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Versuche der Definition: Lebhaftes Schreiben
durch professionelle Modelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essais de définition : Écriture animée 
par les modèles professionnels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Essays da definição: Escrita vívida 
através dos modelos profissionais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Saggi della definizione: Scrittura vivace 
attraverso i modelli professionali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκίμια του καθορισμού: Ζωηρά γράφοντας μέσω 
των επαγγελματικών μοντέλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ensayos de la definición: Escritura animada
a través de modelos profesionales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson examines a professional model of a definition paper and asks students to analyze and imitate the structures of using anecdotes and cause and effect to elaborate an essay of definition.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion überprüft ein professionelles 
vorbildliches eines Definition Papiers und bittet Kursteilnehmer, die 
Strukturen des Verwendens der Anekdoten zu analysieren und nachzuahmen
und zu veranlassen und zu bewirken, auszuarbeitn ein Versuch der 
Definition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon examine un modèle professionnel d'un
papier de définition et demande à des étudiants d'analyser et 
imiter les structures d'utiliser des anecdotes et de les causer et les
effectuer pour élaborer un essai de définition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição examina um modelo profissional de um 
papel da definição e pede que os estudantes analisem e imitate as 
estruturas de usar anecdotes e causem-nas e efetuem-nas elaborar um 
essay da definição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione esamina un di modello professionale
di una carta da definizione e chiede agli allievi di analizzare ed 
imitare le strutture di usando i anecdotes e di causare ed effettuare 
elaborare un saggio della definizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εξετάζει ένα επαγγελματικό μοντέλο 
ενός εγγράφου καθορισμού και ζητά από τους σπουδαστές για να 
αναλύσει και να μιμηθεί τις δομές της χρησιμοποίησης των 
ανέκδοτων και να προκαλέσουν και της επίδρασης για να διαμορφωθεί 
ένα δοκίμιο του καθορισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección examina un modelo profesional de un 
papel de la definición y pide que los estudiantes analicen y que 
imiten las estructuras de usar los anecdotes y que las hagan y que las
efectúen elaborar un ensayo de la definición.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MARGARET RYAN
FN:MARGARET RYAN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103967</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/essays-of-definition-lively-writing-through-professional-models</uri>

  </manifestation>
